mainSequence.step: Reservation System displays Reservation Form to Customer
Customer submits Reservation Details (date, time, number of people) to Reservation System
Reservation System checks Availability with Database
Database confirms Availability to Reservation System
Reservation System shows Confirmation Message to Customer
Reservation System saves Reservation Details to Database
Database sends Confirmation Status to Reservation System
Reservation System displays Reservation ID and Details to Customer
Database shows Unavailability Message to Reservation System
Reservation System suggests Different Time/Date to Customer
